perk.name: craftSkillPrimitiveTools
perk.description_key: The Primitive skill is available to everyone and includes a set of basic weapons and tools that everyone can create. These include Wooden Bow, Bone Shiv, Stone Axe and Stone Shovel. Quality for these are controlled specifically by Primitive Crafting.

perk.name: craftSkillMiscellaneous
perk.description_key: Craft cement and building blocks faster. This perk also controls the quality of your Minibike Parts.
